Name: Mango
About the game: Mango is a surrealist first-person adventure/puzzle game about art and derealization, featuring * trippy, psychedelic visuals * intense psychological and philosophical undertones * fragmented, lore-rich storytelling * experimental horror elements * and last but not least, an overarching feeling of NEVER knowing what to expect . It explores the idea of a mind losing its grasp with reality, as reality turns into a dream, and that dream turns into a nightmare. It has an off-kilter tone that can shift from overly chill to downright scary. Often it resembles an acid trip, or an interactive fever dream. The game contains ~10 hours of gameplay with lots of freaky action, even more freaky fashion, deconstructed urban landscapes and/or dreamscapes, existential angst, questionable parenting, a bit of driving, and a fair load of straight-up madness. It has been described as simultaneously dadaist and hyper-realist in nature, both alien and also deeply human, as well as the story of a life, filtered through the eyes of the mind. Also, it has been described as WEIRD as hell ;) Get into It... Https:/www.facebook.com/mangothegame Https:/www.instagram.com/mangothegame/ ** Photosensitive Warning: Read Before Playing! A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a computer screen, or while playing video games, may induce an epileptic seizure in these individuals. If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your physician prior to playing.
